mapper.select:
select cdm.cd as bat_number_cd , cdm.name as bat_number , mtime.start_time as start_time , mtime.end_time as end_time , to_char(mtime.start_time, 'HH24:MI')||'~'|| to_char(mtime.end_time, 'HH24:MI') as time_slot_name , rslt.member_code as member_code , rslt.status as status , rslt.asp_code as asp_code , rslt.reservation_id as reservation_id
, case when to_timestamp(coalesce(to_char(rslt.reservation_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD)'), #{reservationDate})|| ' ' ||mtime.start_time, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') < current_timestamp then 1 else 0 end as expire_flag
, case when rslt.status = '0' then 0 when coalesce(rslt.member_code, '') = '' then 1 else 0 end as empty_flag from code_master cdm left outer join mst_time_table mtime on mtime.asp_code = '0' left outer join ( select rev.* from tbl_reservation rev inner join tbl_asp asp on rev.asp_code = asp.asp_code
and rev.asp_code = #{aspCode}
and rev.reservation_date = to_date(#{reservationDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
and (rev.status = '1' or (rev.status = '0' and rev.register_date > current_timestamp + '-3 minute' ))
) rslt on (to_char(mtime.start_time, 'HH24:MI')||'~'|| to_char(mtime.end_time, 'HH24:MI')) = rslt.reservation_time and rslt.bat_number = cdm.name where cdm.code_type='990' order by mtime.time_table_code, cdm.cd

select rev.reservation_number as reservation_number , rev.macro_name as macro_name , rev.macro_date_type as macro_date_type , rev.status as status , rev.asp_code as asp_code , rev.bat_number as bat_number , rev.from_reservation_date as from_reservation_date , rev.from_reservation_time as from_reservation_time , rev.to_reservation_date as to_reservation_date , rev.to_reservation_time as to_reservation_time , rev.register_user as register_user , rev.register_date as register_date , rev.update_user as update_user , rev.update_date as update_date , asp.asp_name as asp_name from tbl_macro_reservation_manage rev inner join tbl_asp asp on rev.asp_code = asp.asp_code where rev.status = '1' and rev.asp_code = #{aspCode} order by to_reservation_date desc, to_reservation_time desc
mapper.update: update tbl_reservation SET status = #{statusCd}, update_date = now(), update_user = #{loginUserCd} where reservation_number = #{reservationNumber}
